snippet: Jusepe de Ribera’s portraits, hidden up high and in the darkness of a church in Naples, Italy, are, like the city, expressions of the spiritual embedded in the profane.
lead_paragraph: Jusepe de Ribera’s portraits, hidden up high and in the darkness of a church in Naples, Italy, are, like the city, expressions of the spiritual embedded in the profane.

headline.seo: Ribera’s Church Portraits Join Sacred and Profane
headline.main: Neapolitan Church Portraits Speak to the Earthly World
